turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm trying to transfer money from my checking account to my savings account. Can you help me with that?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, I can certainly assist you with that. To initiate a transfer, please provide the following information: the amount you wish to transfer, and the last four digits of both your checking and savings account numbers. Also, please confirm today's date.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I'd like to transfer $500. My checking account ends in 1234, and my savings account ends in 5678. Today is October 26, 2024. But, wait... I also need to know if I can set this up to be a recurring transfer every month? Like an automatic payment?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Understood. I'm processing your request for a $500 transfer from checking (1234) to savings (5678) on October 26, 2024. Regarding recurring transfers, yes, that feature is available. However, setting that up requires an extra security step. I need to verify your identity through a one-time code sent to your registered email address before I can complete this. Please confirm if you'd like me to proceed with this step, and then, provide the 6-digit code you receive.
